proposal: Understanding the power of Flare Network's EVM-based layer 1 blockchain, with its unique approach to decentralized data feeds and scalable smart contracts, is impressive. Congrats on the 27 holders in the ETH network! Imagine combining your innovative protocols with our suite of B2B tools, like a custom DEX or a blockchain-based lottery, to further empower your community. Let's explore how we can grow together.
